Get Collection of Rulings

Source: R/utils.R
get_collection.Rd

All collections come from the Court's official website, with the exception of jctt, which comes from the "Justicia Constitucional en Tiempos de Transición" project.

Usage

get_collection(
  x = c("gender", "peace", "treaties", "legislative_decrees", "codes", "jctt")
)

Arguments

x

collection name

Value

a list of ruling ids corresponding to that collection

Details

https://www.corteconstitucional.gov.co/relatoria/temas-interes http://justiciatransicional.uniandes.edu.co/web/

Examples


get_collection("peace")
#> $`Ley de justicia y paz`
#>  [1] "C-249-17"  "C-006-17"  "C-494-16"  "C-404-16"  "C-330-16"  "C-161-16"
